pkgmetadata.longdescription: gptcommit is an LLM-powered Git hook tool that auto-generates clear and structured commit messages. After installation, users configure an OpenAI API key to enable LLM-driven analysis of code diffs. It supports multiple languages (e.g., English/Chinese), allows custom models and proxy settings, and provides editable draft messages during commits, streamlining workflows and improving documentation quality.
gptcommit 是一款基于大语言模型的 Git 钩子工具，可自动为代码提交生成清晰 规范的描述性信息。安装后，配置 OpenAI API 密钥即可使用。它支持多语言 （如中英文），允许自定义模型和代理设置，并在提交时分析代码差异生成建议 信息，开发者可自由编辑，适合简化工作流程并提升提交记录可读性。
